name.baseName: Cigarette manufacturing ; Cigarette Rolling ; Bituminous leaves, tobacco stalks, aromatic sugar materials, flakes ; Filament, coiling package, molding process ; All sizes; NESPS2
卷烟制造 ; 卷烟 ; 烟叶、烟梗、香糖料、薄片 ; 制丝、卷接包、成型工艺 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution CigaretteisAbsorption + diversion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management71.1，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution CigaretteisAbsorption + diversion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management71.1，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集代表香烟制造过程中涉及到的工艺，包括沥青叶、烟草梗、香糖料和碎片等各种材料的处理。数据集包括适用于所有规模香烟制造的丝束制作、卷接包装以及成型工艺。数据还包括应用于处理挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）污染的末端处理技术，例如吸附+分流和低温等离子技术，其技术效率分别为71.1%和65.1%。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码16,三级代码162.0,四级代码1620文件，在完整版文件中第149页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAbsorption + diversion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management71.1
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是吸收+分流，其效率为71.1，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施实际运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisLow temperature plasma，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65.1，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是低温等离子体，其效率为65.1，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施实际运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为卷烟，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
